oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Historic RCA Studio B, Home of 1000 Hits
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Sound studios; Studio B (Nashville, Tenn.); Musical instruments; Piano; Restrikes;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Three color window card (red, black and green on white) featuring the historic RCA Studio B, home of 1,000 hits, in Nashville, Tennessee. Poster features a woodcut of piano keys. This poster was reprinted in 2013. Posters printed after the original edition are known as "restrikes."
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Brad Vetter
